title: What’s on Google TV: Disney+ teases expansion, Crunchyroll ditches free streaming for new releases
content:
With plenty to watch in Marvel’s new Moon Knight, Oscar-winning CODA available on Apple TV+, and more, some of the services available on Google TV are shaking things up a bit. This week, Disney+ teased an expansion to many more countries, while Crunchyroll announced it would lessen free streaming.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Disney+ teases expansion, Crunchyroll ditches free streaming for new releases appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Anime streaming service Crunchyroll has announced that it will stop offering new episodes for free viewers starting next season.
